featured.text: Arms extending horizontally commanded drivers to stop, whereas arms lowered to a 45-degree angle told drivers to move on, resembling a traffic director’s gestures.
It is absolutely _____ to waste your money on an expensive car when you cannot even get a driver’s license.
A variety of driver assistance technologies are appearing on new cars.
The bus driver often complains about chewing gum found under passenger seats because it is and very hard to remove.

other.text: To challenge the current legal alcohol limit for drivers in the United States. 51.
Feeling quite sick with fear, I sat on the driver’s seat, trying to stop trembling.
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Cars will refuse to start if the driver is drunk.
A “positive” test result, a result over the legal limit, allows the police to arrest the driver.

definition.zh_def: 駕駛者；駕駛汽車或其他交通工具的人。
definition.en_def: A person who operates a vehicle.
definition.example: The driver carefully navigated through the busy streets.
